sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 過去的半個世紀內，美國一直是世界的麪包籃子。

sentences.english: Or that double-digit interest rates dominated the 19th century?
sentences.chinese: 或者19世紀的利率以兩位數爲主？

sentences.english: Gradually,it became a stage show on its own in the eighteenth century.
sentences.chinese: 在十八世紀，芭蕾漸漸地發展成爲了一種舞臺表演。

sentences.english: Lotteries have two centuries of history in Spain.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙的彩票歷史已有兩個世紀。

sentences.english: Xiangyin Jianzi is a local rhyme dictionary of the Changsha dialect in the early 20th Century.
sentences.chinese: 《湘音檢字》是一部反映20世紀初長沙方言的韻書。

sentences.english: Mei Lanfang is one of the greatest artor in China in 20th centry.
sentences.chinese: 梅蘭芳是一個在第二十世紀在中國最大的阿託。

sentences.english: The history of those archaeologicalfinds goes back to the 2ndcentury.
sentences.chinese: 這些歷史文物的發現可追溯到2世紀。

sentences.english: The Kizil Grottoes were built one century early than the Mogao Grottoes.
sentences.chinese: 克孜爾石窟營造年代早於敦煌莫高窟一個多世紀。

sentences.english: Metro line 2 to century avenue Station, about 10 min walk to the hostel.
sentences.chinese: 坐地鐵2號線世紀大道站下，步行10分鐘到旅舍。

sentences.english: Scenes from the 17th century landscape paintings were replicated as Arcadian scenes.
sentences.chinese: 場景從17世紀景觀作爲田園場景複製畫。

sentences.english: In the implementation of this cross-century strategy, ethnic issues merit special attention.
sentences.chinese: 民族問題在這項跨世紀戰略的實施中具有特殊的地位。

sentences.english: Around the 4th century AD, the site of the Oita city was once called "Bungo".
sentences.chinese: 大約在公元4世紀，大分市所在地域便被稱爲豐後國。

sentences.english: In tenth-century France, the doors of traitors and criminals were painted yellow.
sentences.chinese: 在十世紀的法國，叛徒和罪犯的門都被漆成黃色。

sentences.english: But he is also under the gun from lawmakers over Bank Century.
sentences.chinese: 但是他也處於世紀銀行調查的槍口之下。

sentences.english: He’s perhaps the most well-known painter from all of the 20:th century.
sentences.chinese: 他或許是近一個世紀以來最負盛名的藝術家。

sentences.english: Founded as a monastery center in the early 5th century, it is the capital of Moldavia.
sentences.chinese: 它於5世紀早期建立成爲一個修道院中心。

definition: to rise/to spring up/to burgeon/to be aroused/to come into vogue
in those days/then/in those years/during that time
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
